% --- GEOMETRY & LINE SPACING ---
\usepackage[margin=1.2in]{geometry}
\usepackage{setspace}
\setstretch{1.25}

% Load xcolor package with the HTML color model
\usepackage[HTML]{xcolor}

% --- LOAD FONTSPEC AND SET FONT ---
\usepackage{fontspec}

% Set the main font AND all its variants using the full path
\setmainfont{Bookerly.ttf}[
  % Standard variants for Markdown (Bold, Italic)
  BoldFont       = {Bookerly Bold.ttf},
  ItalicFont     = {Bookerly LCD Italic.ttf},
  BoldItalicFont = {Bookerly Bold Italic.ttf},
  % Lighter weight variants
  FontFace       = {l}{n}{Font = {Bookerly Light.ttf}},
  FontFace       = {l}{it}{Font = {Bookerly Light Italic.ttf}}
]

% Set the page background color to sepia (e.g., FBF0D9)
\pagecolor[HTML]{FBF0D9}

% Set the default text color to a dark sepia/brown (e.g., 453823)
\color[HTML]{453823}
